verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Light after darkness
gain after loss
Strength after weakness
crown after cross
Sweet after bitter
hope after fears
Home after wandering
praise after tears

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sheaves after sowing
sun after rain
Sight after mystery
peace after pain
Joy after sorrow
calm after blast
Rest after weariness
sweet rest at last

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Near after distant
gleam after gloom
Love after loneliness
life after tomb
After long agony
rapture of bliss
Right was the pathway
leading to this
